roleset.name: having incalculable worth

example.name: Arg1 only
example.text: Now I am a fan of the Post Office in the sense I believe the service they -LRB- should ! -RRB- offer is invaluable , however , when I read this article I thought why are they investing in " intelligent stamps " and not improving the service they offer

example.name: All args
example.text: Their advice was invaluable to me at that stage of my life.
example.arg: at that stage of my life.

roleset.note: INVALUABLE-J NOTES: Roleset based on instances in BOLT P01, parts 2,3. Framed by Claire. (from invaluable.01-j)
